description:
Learn English while having fun making your first Excel spreadsheet. In about one hour you will learn important business vocabulary and the commands that make Excel an awesome piece of software.

The course will start with simple data entry to get you started on your first spreadsheet. While you are learning working your way through the course, there are subtitles so you can follow along and learn from my spoken English. I'll teach you the vocabulary of Excel along with other important business English vocabulary.

You can open up your Excel 2013 and follow along with my simple lessons. You can download the spreadsheet from each lesson and the text with my speaking to the lesson. That way you can put the text into Google translate and translate the English into your own native language. Although, I don't think you'll need to do that.

The course will last about one hour and you will feel comfortable making your own Excel workbook by the end of it. You will also be able to communicate with international colleagues using the language of Excel.

So, take the course now, improve your English and start advancing your career!
title: ESL Excel Essentials: Improve Your English and Your Career
